item.title: Round Travertine Table
item.dc:creator: Categoryisstone
item.description:
Category is form, minimal, & cone. The Round Travertine Table features a round top with full bullnose edging complementing a round cone shape base. The natural stone presents a beige base with light & dark veining throughout, simply timeless. Designed by Australian architectural designers. Each piece is made to order, no two pieces are the same due to the variation of the natural stone.
  • Lead & delivery time: 6-8 weeks.
  • Custom sizes & other natural stones are available upon request.
item.content:encoded:
Dimension: 100cm (DIA) x 75m (H).
Materials: Roman Travertine Stone (unfilled or filled).
Colour: Beige.
Finish: Honed or Polished.
Weight: Approx. 100kg+
Stone top thickness: 2cm.

item.title: Calacatta Viola Marble T Side Table
item.dc:creator: Categoryisstone
item.description:
Category is form, minimal, & slim. The Calacatta Viola Marble T Side Table features a square top complementing a t shape base with a void between the two legs. The marble presents a white base with dark purple veining throughout, simply timeless. Designed by Australian architectural designers. They are handmade by highly skilled stonemasons with years of experience. Each piece is made to order, no two pieces are the same due to the variation of the natural stone.
  • Lead time 4 weeks.
  • Delivered in 1-2 weeks.
  • Custom sizes & other natural stones are available upon request.
  Download Spec Sheet – PDF
item.content:encoded:
Dimension: 350mm (L) x  350mm (W) x 450mm (H).
Materials: Calacatta Viola Marble.
Colour: White & Purple.
Finish: Honed or Polished.
Weight: 13kg.
Stone thickness: 2cm.

item.title: Calacatta Monet Plump Dish
item.dc:creator: Categoryisstone
item.description:
Category is form, minimal, & void. The Calacatta Monet Plump Dish features a round shape with a thick curved edge, with two recessed voids located in the middle. The marble presents a white base wtih dark purple & grey veining throughout, simply timeless. Designed in Australia by architectural designers. They are handmade by highly skilled stonemasons with years of experience. Each piece is made to order, no two pieces are the same due to the variation of the natural stone.
  • Lead time 1-2 weeks.
  • Delivered in 1-2 weeks.
  • Custom sizes & other natural stones available upon request.
  Download Spec Sheet – PDF
item.content:encoded:
• Dimension: 170mm (L) x  170mm (W) x 30mm (H).
  • Materials: Calacatta Monet Marble.
  • Colour: White, Purple, Grey.
  • Finish: Honed.
  • Weight: 1.5kg.

item.title: Calacatta Viola Marble Tray
item.dc:creator: Categoryisstone
item.description:
Category is minimal, slim & served. The Calacatta Viola Tray is a gorgeous rectangular pieces of natural stone ready to display your special items. The marble presents a white base with dark purple & grey veining throughout, simply timeless. Designed by Australian architectural designers. They are handmade to order, no two pieces are the same due to the variation of the natural stone.
  • Total lead & delivery time: 2-4 weeks.
  • Custom sizes and marble are available upon request.
item.content:encoded:
Dimension: 42x20x1.8cm.
Materials: Italian Calacatta Viola Marble.
Colour: White, Grey, Purple.
Finish: Honed.
Weight: 4kg.
Stone thickness: 1.8cm.

item.title: Calacatta Monet Marble Stand
item.dc:creator: Categoryisstone
item.description:
Category is minimal, black & raw edges. The Calacatta Monet Stand features an offcut stone piece top complementing 3x Matt Black Aluminium legs. The marble presents a white base with dark purple & grey veining throughout, simply timeless.
Designed by Australian architectural designers. They are handmade, no two pieces are the same due to the variation of the natural stone.
item.content:encoded:
Dimension: Varies.
Materials: Calacatta Monet Marble.
Colour: White, Grey, Purple.
Finish: Honed.
Weight: Approx. 1kg.
Stone thickness: 2cm.
Total height: 4cm.

item.description:

The marble presents a black base with white purple veining throughout, simply timeless. Designed by Australian architectural designers. They are handmade by highly skilled stonemasons with years of experience. Each piece is made to order, no two pieces are the same due to the variation of the natural stone.

Designed in Australia by architectural designers. They are handmade, no two pieces are the same due to the variation of the natural stone.
